mapinfo.detailsText:
A large number of ponds dot the landscape in this area. The local Cree peoples may prove a powerful alliance, and players have a vast amount of natural resources at their disposal. A lucrative trade route passes through the area and may prove to be a point of early contention. Controlling the ponds will be essential, but don't neglect your land presence. 
 
 Outlaws: Renegado / Comanchero 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Observer UI by Aizamk 
 


 
 Map by dansil92
